short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This browser extension prevents your important tabs from closing, reloading, or leaving in order to keep you focused.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It'll alert you with a message if you try to close, reload, or leave the page anyway.

- Why our extension?
= Only by one click.
= Open-Source.
